Southern directions 8-13 m/s, by dayCircumstances

Arresling competitions will take place in the great Lucas on Father's Day (12+)Yesterday, 15:30.0

The struggle will take place on the left and right hand in three weight categories: up to 75 kilograms, up to 85 kilograms and over 85 kilograms. Winners are shown by sumtwo sets diagrams

info.title: The Ricks Atlantic Cyclone brings ice rains and meteli to North-West
info.short_text:
The " Rosetti North-West " , in Arkhangel, Vlogod, Novgorod, Pskov and the Republic of Kareliyah, are highly alert.

526 emergency brigades and 1,084 units of equipment ready for rapid recovery diagrams

info.title: Oncologist warned of the first symptoms of a lethal disease.
info.short_text: In most cases, eye cancer occurs unnoticed in the early stages, the first serious signs emerge when the disease progresses, alerts oncologists and onco-surgeons.

info.title: The great businessmen will not be allowed to hang air-conditioners on the facades of houses.
info.short_text:
In the " Gold Patrol " programme at the Luka FM radio station, the Chief of the Advanced Development Committee for the Construction, Architecture and Urban Development of the City Administration of the Great Luki Margarita Mischenkov described the introduction of the design code in the Great Luka. Among other things, the theme of the external type of facades in the central part of the city was raised.

Previously, Lucky. Rue was told that the city ' s inhabitants in social media complained that air-conditioners ruined the kind of facades home.

info.title: Nicolai Kozlovsky, head of town, spoke about the work of the Authenia-Pskovsky sports club.
info.short_text:
In a weekly video presentation, the head of the town, Nikolai Kozlovsky, spoke about the " Authenticity-Pskovskaya Region " sport club. The Heritage Club was established in August 2018.

The club is doing a great job of popularizing Sambo Circus.
